thread.section_title: Protea Hotel by Marriott Entebbe - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Really nice experience
thread.title_full: Really nice experience - Review of Protea Hotel by Marriott Entebbe, Entebbe, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: Annarose816
title: Really nice experience
text:
The hotel is under renovation, so there's a lot of somewhat awkward accommodations being made (they're putting in a new reservations desk, for instance, so they're using a temporary one), and there were intermittent power outages. However, the staff was unfailingly polite, friendly and helpful. In fact, when our taxi was late, the GM had the hotel van run us to our event, and he himself came to pick us back up at the end!
The views are lovely, the pool area delightful, and the food was pretty good, with the breakfast buffet a standout.
My room was very clean, though the lake flies are inescapable; beds and linens were very comfortable, and the AC worked like a charm. Overall a very nice place to stay!
